name: Barbara Gordon as Oracle, Bird of Prey
effect:
Activate >>> Draw a card.

Activate >>> Oracle gets +3 ATK this attack.
Nothing happens in Gotham without her knowing it

  • Collector Number: DBM-001
  • Rarity: C
  • Card Type: Character
  • Team Affiliation: Gotham Knights
  • Attack Value (ATK): 2
  • Defense Value (DEF): 4
  • Recruit or Threshold Cost: 3
  • Artist: Phil Noto

Activate >>> Oracle gets +3 ATK this attack.
Nothing happens in Gotham without her knowing it

name: Batcomputer
effect:
Activate >>> Target Gotham Knights character you control gets +1 ATK and has flight and range this turn.
It contains every case, every criminal, every clue.

name: Batman, Shadow of the Bat
effect:
While you have seven or more cards in hand, whenever Batman stuns a character, that character's controller loses endurance equal to that character's cost. (This is in addition to the normal stun endurance loss.)
In Gotham, criminals have good reason to be a cowardly and superstitious lot.

name: Batman, Vengeance
effect:
Whenever Batman or another Gotham Knights character you control becomes stunned, each of your opponents loses 1 endurance.
"I am vengeance. I am the night. I am Batman."

name: Bronze Tiger, Brainwashed Assassin
effect:
Activate >>> Target League of Assassins character you control gets +2 ATK and +2 DEF this attack.
The League of Assassins wanted his skill, so they took his soul.

name: Cassandra Cain as Batgirl, Student of the Knight
effect:
Whenever Cassandra Cain stuns a character, that character's controller loses 2 endurance. (This is in addition to the normal stun endurance loss.)
Her father taught her one way of life. Batman is teaching her another.

name: Catwoman, Cat Burglar
effect:
Whenever Catwoman causes breakthrough, draw a card.
"Just make sure we aren't seen together. I have a reputation, you know."

name: Commissioner Gordon, Lieutenant Gordon
effect:
When Commissioner Gordon comes into play, you may search your deck for a character card named Batman and reveal it. If you searched, shuffle your deck, then put that card on the top of your deck.
"I've seen him. He's a man, not a monster."

name: Dick Grayson as Nightwing, Defender of Blüdhaven
effect:
Whenever Dick Grayson stuns a character, draw a card.

Discard a Gotham Knights character card from your hand >>> Target defender has reinforcement this attack.
Nightwing protects crime-riddled Blüdhaven, located just outside Gotham City.

  • Collector Number: DBM-007
  • Rarity: C
  • Card Type: Character
  • Team Affiliation: Gotham Knights
  • Attack Value (ATK): 12
  • Defense Value (DEF): 12
  • Recruit or Threshold Cost: 6
  • Artist: Brian Haberlin

Discard a Gotham Knights character card from your hand >>> Target defender has reinforcement this attack.
Nightwing protects crime-riddled Blüdhaven, located just outside Gotham City.

name: Fear Skull
effect:
As an additional cost to play Fear Skull, exhaust a character you control.

If target opponent has more endurance than you, that opponent loses 4 endurance. Otherwise, that opponent loses 2 endurance.
"Let's see what scares the Bat!"

  • Collector Number: DBM-025
  • Rarity: C
  • Card Type: Plot Twist
  • Attack Value (ATK): 0
  • Defense Value (DEF): 0
  • Recruit or Threshold Cost: 1
  • Artist: Stuart Sayger

If target opponent has more endurance than you, that opponent loses 4 endurance. Otherwise, that opponent loses 2 endurance.
"Let's see what scares the Bat!"

name: Flying Fortress
effect:
Activate >>> Target League of Assassins character has flight this turn. That character gets +2 ATK while attacking this turn.
More than just an airship, it holds the key to Ra’s al Ghul’s master plan.

name: Gotham City
effect: Activate, exhaust a Gotham Knights character you control >>> Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a Gotham Knights character card with cost 3 or greater, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck.

name: Hook, Hired Killer
effect: At the start of the recovery phase, you may KO target stunned character with cost 3 or less.

name: Huntress, Bird of Prey
effect:
Huntress gets +3 ATK while attacking.
"Batman can fight for justice. I just want revenge."

name: Kyle Abbot, Demon's Hound
effect:
Kyle Abbot gets +1 ATK and +1 DEF while you have the initiative.
Give him an inch and he'll take your life.

name: Lady Shiva, The Destroyer
effect:
Whenever Lady Shiva attacks a character, that character loses reinforcement and cannot gain reinforcement this attack.
"You're nothing more than a momentary distraction."

name: Merlyn, Archer Assassin
effect: Activate >>> Target player loses 5 endurance.

name: Ra's al Ghul, Eternal Nemesis
effect:
Whenever Ra's al Ghul causes breakthrough while attacking a character, KO that character.
"Humanity is the bane of the Earth, Detective. It must die so that the Earth can live."

name: Ra's al Ghul, Undying
effect:
Whenever Ra's al Ghul becomes stunned, you may return him to his owner's hand. If you do, gain 7 endurance.
Death is merely an inconvenience to the master of the Lazarus Pits.

name: Shadow of the Bat
effect: Target character you control gets +1 ATK and +1 DEF this attack.

name: Spoiler, Wildcard
effect:
When Spoiler comes into play, draw a card.
She'll do anything to prove she's ready. And that alone proves she isn't.

name: Swing Line
effect:
Target character you control has flight and range this turn. That character gets +2 ATK while attacking this turn.
Gotham's rooftops were once "the thieves' highway," but now they belong to the Bat.

name: Talia, Beloved Daughter
effect:
When Talia comes into play, you may search your deck for a character card named Ra's al Ghul and reveal it. If you searched, shuffle your deck, then put that card on the top of your deck.
She is Ra's al Ghul's daughter, but she is also Batman's beloved.

name: Tim Drake as Robin, Protégé
effect:
Activate >>> Target Gotham Knights character you control gets +3 ATK this attack.
"Just don't call me a sidekick and we'll get along fine."

name: Trial by Sword
effect:
Target character you control gets +2 ATK and +2 DEF this turn while attacking a character with greater cost or while defending against a character with greater cost.
"I've been a master swordsman for over 200 years, Detective. You cannot hope to defeat me."

name: Ubu Encampment
effect: Activate, exhaust a League of Assassins character you control >>> Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a League of Assassins character card with cost 3 or greater, put that card into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck.

name: Ubu, One of Many
effect:
Ubu gets +1 ATK and +1 DEF while protecting a League of Assassins character. If that character is named Ra's al Ghul, Ubu gets an additional +1 ATK and +1 DEF. (Stunned characters are not protected.)
Generations of men have protected Ra's al Ghul, all of them bearing the same title.

name: Whisper A'Daire, Serpent-Tongued Seductress
effect:
Whisper A'Daire gets +1 ATK and +1 DEF while you control a character named Kyle Abbot.
He provides the strength. She provides the subtlety.
